description:
Get in touch with your wild side by dressing your farmer up in this Fox Costume for STORY OF SEASONS: Pioneers of Olive Town. Your new foxy look is sure to turn heads!

This set includes the following items:
- Fox Costume
- Fox Headwear

To equip these items in-game, examine the wardrobe in your house or the fitting room in the salon.
name: Fox Costume
